title: **THE MODERN
seo_description: After exploring your favorite modern art at MoMA, you deserve to indulge on chef Abram Bissell's contemporary cuisine. This airy space and beautiful plating will keep art activated through all of your senses. Lunch and dinner are offered in a tasting menu format as you sit looking out that the Abby Aldrich Rockefeller Sculpture Garden.
contents:
Foie Gras Tart with Winter Citrus and Onion
9 W 53rd St
walk: 8 minutes

After exploring your favorite modern art at MoMA, you deserve to indulge on chef Abram Bissell's contemporary cuisine. This airy space and beautiful plating will keep art activated through all of your senses. Lunch and dinner are offered in a tasting menu format as you sit looking out that the Abby Aldrich Rockefeller Sculpture Garden.
